body: I have had the issue as well

This is actually a regression introduced in the SmallRye Common Process conversion.

Will fix.

issue.title: ComposeRunner - Avoid resetting env vars
issue.body:
This is a regression introduced by the move to SmallRye Common Process.

Fixes #49380

body:
> [@rsvoboda](https://github.com/rsvoboda) can you try [#49604](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/49604)?

Sorry @gsmet, I can't promise anything for today or tomorrow. I have some possible slots on Thursday evening ...
I merged it. It might or might not fix your entire issue but the current code was incorrect. I want to have it in next 3.25.
would be easy for me to test when it lands in 3.25
